unnormalised: Boro, geometry ani trig, hã? Aikuk bhirant disota, punn mhojem aik, tem *itench* vaitt na. Tankam ankddeam ani akarancher soddovpache kodde mantat - ek Sudoku bhaxen, punn konn ani lini ditlea. Tumi skoolintlem tem compass ani protraktor ugddas kortat? Ho, teo vostu. Tem amkam fokot tras divpak naslem!
normalised: Barobar, jemiti ani trig, hã? Bhiranticho dista, punn mhojem aikonk, tem itlem vaitt na. Ank ani akarancher puzzle asa mhonn chint - Sudoku bhaxen, punn konn ani lini asun. Tumkam xallentlim tim compass ani protractor ugddaita? Hoi, tim vostu. Pata lagta ki tim fokot amkam tras diunk nasli!

unnormalised: Basics-an survat koruya. Tumcheकडे pintu, lini, plano asa - tem bandkam korpache blok. Magir maja ieta: trikoṇ! Right-angled, equilateral, isosceles...te geometryche Bollywood star bhaxen asat. Dor eklo aplem natak ani khas gunn dharun asa. Pythagoras Theorem (a² + b² = c²) right-angled trikoṇanche khanniantlo hero asa. Gombhirayen, ugddas dovora. Tuka tachi goroz poddttoli.
normalised: Chala, mulbhut gozalim thaun suru koruya. Tumchea lagim point, line, plane asa - bandkamachea block. Ani magir majechim vostu ieta: triangle! Right-angled, equilateral, isosceles...tim jemiti che B-O-L-L-Y-W-O-O-D stare bhaxen asta. Dor eka zannacho aplo drama ani khas gunn dharma asta. Pythagoras Theorem (a squared plus b squared equals c squared) ho right-angled triangle story cho hero. Gambhirtai n, tem kanthast kara. Tumkam tem zai poddtta.

unnormalised: Magir circle asat. πr², 2πr - heo tumche mantr. Ugddas dovora, π lagbhog 3.14 asa (vo 22/7 tumi junem-skool distelear). Circle soglleakuch asa, tumchea auto-rickshawache chokrantelean tumchea plate vel samosa meren (boro, poryan samosa ek bhagele circle nasonk zata, punn mhoje sangatim kam korunchea!).
normalised: Magir circle asa. pi r squared, two pi r – hi tumchi mantra. Ugddas dovorat, pi lagbhog tin point eka char (vo don ponnas zok ek sat zaliar, tum old-school zata). Circle soglleak dison ieta, tumchea auto-rickshaw chea chakr thaun tumchea thalleantlea samosa poriant (thik asa, samosa eka perfect circle zanvchena punn tum mhoje kodden kaam kara!).

unnormalised: Atam, trigonometry-cher. Hanga vostu *thoddeo* odik jatileo, punn chinta kor naka. Sine, cosine, tangent - he fokot right-angled trikoṇantle vattenche gunottor asat. SOH CAH TOA (Some Old Horses Catch Another Horse Taking Oats Away) ho trick mhojem tuchsyon ticher, Mr. Sharma, amkam ugddas dovorteleak vapartalo. Ani tem kam korta!
normalised: Atam, trigonometry kodden yetanv. Hi gozal thodi kathinn asa, punn chinta korunk naka. Sine, cosine, tangent – hi right-angled triangle chea bajunchi ratio asa. S-O-H C-A-H T-O-A (Some Old Horses Catch Another Horse Taking Oats Away) hi trick mhaka Mister Sharma, mhoje tuition shikxokan ugddas dovrunk vapurtalo. Ani tem kaam karta!

unnormalised: Hacher vichar kor: sine mhunttlear opposite over hypotenuse (SOH), cosine mhunttlear adjacent over hypotenuse (CAH), ani tangent mhunttlear opposite over adjacent (TOA). Tumi tankam konn vo vattenk soddunk vaprunk zata tumkam puro information astana. Qutub Minar choddunk ani tanchea unchai soddunk zata fakt elevation-acho konn kitlo asa te dishttaun ek nirdhisht distancerechea bhaxen. Hankai trig kamak yeta.
normalised: He ritin chintat: sine opposite over hypotenuse (S-O-H), cosine adjacent over hypotenuse (C-A-H), ani tangent opposite over adjacent (T-O-A). Zannkai purnn zaliar tum konn vo bajun kaddunk hi vaprunk xakta. Qutub Minar choddttat ani tanche height kaddunk zai ek nischit antarachi angle of elevation zanno asa mhonn chintat. Thain trig apleak modot korta.

unnormalised: Sondheponnan, hem lokhan korunk formuula ugddas dovornuche poros vostunche bhitor relation koso asa tem zannunk zai. Problem dhishttaupachek moti difference asta. Diagram-a kadunk prayatn kor, sogllek label di ani complex akarancher simplar akarancher bhag di. Geometry box tumcho ixtt hanga, dusman nhoi!
normalised: Sodhen, he vostunche mastery formula kanthast korpachea bodlek vostunchea atlo sambhand somzunk asa. Problem visual korlear vhodd bhed zata. Diagram kadunk proyatn karat, soglleamk labelling karat, ani kathinn akar sodhe aakarancher bhagantunk. Jemiti box tumcho ixtt, dushman nhoi!

unnormalised: Real-world applications? Dhagosta! Architecture geometry ani trig vaparta ghor, pul ani layout design korunk. Navigation system trig vaparta distances ani directions count korunk. Video games poryan vaparta realistic graphics ani movement create korunk. Tem fancy mandir tumi Hampi-k dislem? Geometry ani Trigonometry. Taj Mahalachem design? Geometry ani Trigonometry. Vichar kor tem person-ek sine, cosine ani tangent zann aslem?
normalised: Real-world applications? Bharpur! Architecture geometry ani trig bandkam, pul ani layout dizain korunk vaporta. Navigation system trig antar ani disha calculate korunk vaporta. Video game legit graphics ani movement tiar korunk vapurtat. Tumchea dista tim Hampi chem mandar? Geometry ani Trignometry. Taj Mahal chi design? Geometry ani Trignometry. Dizain korpeak sine, cosine, ani tangent zanno asa mhonn chintat?

unnormalised: Ani modot magunk bhiyenaaka! Online dhagosta resources asa, textbook-an, ani teacherank zankam odik sangpak maja yetelem vostunchea vixyan. Khan Academy bhaxen sites vo YouTube tutorial poryan jivech rakhtolo tumi ek problemar atklear.
normalised: Ani modot magonk bhivat zanv naka! Online, textbook ani shikshanchea lagim purai resourse asa tankam sogllenk somzavnk khuxi asa. K-H-A-N Academy vo YouTube tutorial tumche jivank rakhunk xakta tum problemant assa tean.

unnormalised: Ani, dusre pavtt tumi trikoṇ vo circle pollelaar, bhagunk naka. Challenge-ak sambhal ani tumi kitem count korunk zata tem polleya. Ani ugddas dovora: tumi chuklear poryan, tumi poryan pusta ani punha prayatn korunk zata. Life bhaxenuch, hai na?
normalised: Ani, dusrea velar tum ek triangle vo circle pollelear, chikhat marun dhavat zanv naka. Avhaan samballat ani tum sodunk kitnem xakta tem polleat. Ani ugddas dovorat: tum chuklear, tum tem pusunk ani dusrea velar proyatn korunk xakta. Jivit bhaxen, hai na?

unnormalised: Ani, konnem geometry vo trig-achem question tumcher marlear, fakt zallo marekar poleunaka. Prayatn di! Ani konn zanna, tumkam maja yetalem tacher. At least, tumche poros tumi dishes kortelechem maja dita, right? Atam fuddem voch ani te konn jikh! Tangent vaprunk zata kitlench veg tumkam lagchim vaddopa stall meren vochunk zata. Tem applied maths asa, hanga.
normalised: Ani, konne jemiti vo trig prashn tumcher marlear, tum tika rikamem polleunk naka. Eak shot diat! Ani konn zannar, tum tika khuxal kortolo. Atleast, tum dishen kartanv tanchea voilean, barobar? Atam fuddem vat ani tem konn jinktat polleat! Maybe tangent vaparat tum kitem vegim lagichea vada pav stallak vochat polleunk. Tem applied maths, thain asa.
